objects.text:
• 16.3MP X-Trans CMOS II Sensor
• Advanced Autofocus System
• Full HD Video Recording
• Wi-Fi Connectivity

product_details.name: Fujifilm X-T10 Mirrorless Digital Camera - Professional Photography Made Accessible
product_details.description:
• Classic retro-styled design with robust metal build quality
• Advanced 16.3MP APS-C X-Trans CMOS II Sensor for exceptional image quality
• High-performance autofocus system with 77 AF points
• Built-in electronic viewfinder (EVF) with 2.36M-dot resolution
• Tiltable 3-inch LCD screen for creative angle shooting
• Compatible with Fujifilm's renowned X-mount lens system
• Film simulation modes for unique creative effects
• Wi-Fi connectivity for easy photo sharing and remote control
• Full HD 1080p video recording capability
• Compact and lightweight design perfect for travel photography
• Multiple manual control dials for precise shooting settings
• Up to 8 FPS continuous shooting speed

banner_details:
This dynamic promotional banner features an elegant split-layout design with a modern grid and geometric background. The left half predominantly utilizes dark grey tones, creating a sleek and professional aesthetic, while the right half contrasts with a bold red section that draws attention to the highlights. A high-resolution product image is placed prominently on the right, overlapping both sections to emphasize the item being promoted. The banner contains multiple text elements, including a bold main heading (`heading`), a red-accented subheading (`subheading`), a tagline (`tagline`), and key product details (`description`). Price information (`price`) and a vibrant call-to-action (`cta`) are positioned on the left. On the right, promotional text (`offer_text`) and a complementary footer tagline (`footer_tagline`) complete the layout. Subtle abstract elements and icons enhance the futuristic visual appeal.

**Color Palette:**
- Charcoal Black (#1A1A1A)
- Graphite Grey (#222222, #2A2A2A, #333333)
- Vivid Red (#FF3838)
- Pure White (#FFFFFF)
- Cool Grey (#CCCCCC)
product_color: The product image showcases a sleek Fujifilm X-T10 camera dominated by matte and glossy shades of black (#0B0B0B) and charcoal grey (#3A3A3A), creating a professional and modern appearance. Metallic elements are highlighted subtly through deep silver tones (#6F6F6F), and white (#FFFFFF) is used for branding and dial markings, enhancing readability. Small accents of red (#FF2C2C), orange (#F68B1F), and gold-yellow (#F4C542) on the lens ring offer visual interest and break the monotony of dark tones. The blend of matte textures with reflective surfaces gives the product depth and dimension. Ideal banner colors are black, charcoal, silver, and accent hues for highlights.
